text: "Big Dreams in a Small Town" is a 1989 song by American country band Restless Heart and is the title track to their third studio album Big Dreams in a Small Town. It went to number 3 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs and number 5 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks charts. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Country songs Category:Restless Heart songs
title: Big Dreams in a Small Town (song)
